recommended_degree: Manajemen, Manajemen Bisnis, Administrasi Niaga, Administrasi Bisnis, Bisnis (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Provide general administrative and operational support for day-to-day marketing activities.

2. Support sampling activities, including procurement, distribution, and tracking feedback.

3. Support in basic data gathering and basic analysis for product performance or research needs.

4. Help manage project timelines, reminders, and follow-ups to ensure tasks stay on track.
